abstract: The auction giant said it would begin selling radio airtime to advertisers, expanding into a business that Google entered last year.
snippet: The auction giant said it would begin selling radio airtime to advertisers, expanding into a business that Google entered last year.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, June 5  The auction giant eBay said it would begin selling radio airtime to advertisers starting Wednesday, expanding into a business that Google entered last year

headline.main: Radio Time to Join List of eBay Items Up for Auction
headline.print_headline: Radio Time To Join List Of eBay Items Up for Auction

abstract: Google said it has purchased closely held PeakStream, a start-up that sells tools for programming chips with multiple processing units.
lead_paragraph: Google said it has purchased closely held PeakStream, a start-up that sells tools for programming chips with multiple processing units.
